twcore.core.game
Interface ShipRestrictor

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicRestrictor, CompoundRestrictor
public interface ShipRestrictor

The ShipRestrictor interface defines a set of methods to be used by the integrated ship access control in the Team class.

Version:
06.12.27
Author:
D1st0rt

Field Summary
static short UNRESTRICTED
          Supplying this value for maximum allowed means there is no limit
 
Method Summary
 boolean canSwitch(Player p, byte ship, Team team)
          Determines whether a player can switch to a particular ship or not
 byte fallbackShip()
          Gets the ship to set the player in when they are not allowed to switch
 

Field Detail

UNRESTRICTED

static final short UNRESTRICTED
Supplying this value for maximum allowed means there is no limit

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

canSwitch

boolean canSwitch(Player p,
                  byte ship,
                  Team team)
Determines whether a player can switch to a particular ship or not

Parameters:
p - the player in question
ship - the ship the player wishes to switch to
team - the player's team
Returns:
true if the player is allowed to switch, false otherwise

fallbackShip

byte fallbackShip()
Gets the ship to set the player in when they are not allowed to switch

Returns:
a ship value from 0-7, or 8 for spectator
